text: how do people handle stopping/restarting a julia process in a docker container? As far as I'm aware, docker sends SIGTERM and we'd like to handle that gracefully but haven't found a good way to do so... we currently only exit gracefully on SIGINT, since we can catch that via InterruptException :/
